activities: Therapath performs diagnostic and consultative muscle, nerve and neuropathology services. It processes personal data (names, contact details, heatlh information and payment information) in connection with performing these services.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
orgverification: Third Party: King & Spalding Legal advisers
personaldata: Personal data from the EU processed by Therapath: off-line, on-line and manually processed personal data. No human resources data from the EU is processed by Therapath.
